item.title: Heroes of the Borderlands
item.description:
Heroes of the Borderlands#

A Remastered Wild and Wacky Adventure#

Status: ✅ Completed
System: D&D 5e (Modified)
Theme: Comedy, Chaos, Borderlands-inspired

Campaign Overview#

A remastered adventure that combined the chaotic energy of Borderlands video games with D&D mechanics. Players experienced a wild ride filled with:

  • Over-the-top action and humor
  • Unique weapons and loot
  • Memorable NPCs inspired by Borderlands characters
  • High-octane combat and ridiculous situations

What Made It Special#

Loot System: Weapons and items with Borderlands-style rarity and effects.

item.title: Jungle of Jyggalag
item.description:
Jungle of Jyggalag#

A Short Daggerheart Adventure#

Status: ✅ Completed
System: Daggerheart (Darrington Press)
Theme: Mystery, Jungle Exploration, System Test

Campaign Overview#

A short-form campaign designed to explore the Daggerheart system by Darrington Press. Set in a mysterious jungle connected to Jyggalag, players experienced a different kind of TTRPG system while still maintaining narrative depth.

This campaign served as both an adventure and a learning experience for trying out new mechanics:
